title: PriceExpressionEnum
description: Enumerated values to specify whether the price is expressed in absolute or relative terms.

oneOf.title: AbsoluteTerms
oneOf.description: The price is expressed as an absolute amount.

oneOf.title: ParValueFraction
oneOf.description: Denotes a price expressed in percentage of face value with fractions which is used for quoting bonds, e.g. 101 3/8 indicates that the buyer will pay 101.375 of the face value.

oneOf.title: PerOption
oneOf.description: Denotes a price expressed per number of options.

oneOf.title: PercentageOfNotional
oneOf.description: The price is expressed in percentage of the notional amount.
